burnTreasury(uint256).details: Can be called by world asset or building owner

params.amount: Amount of resources to burn from treasury

decreaseAdditionalWorkersCapacityMultipl.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

distributeToAllShareholders().details: Useful to get full produced resources to all shareholders

distributeToSingleShareholder(address).details: Useful to taking part of the resource from the building for single shareholder (to not pay gas for minting for all shareholders)

epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

fixDebtAccordingToNewDistributionsAmount.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by distributions

getAdvancedUpgradeCooldownDuration(uint2.details: If level=1 then returned value will be duration which is taken for upgrading from 1 to 2 level

params.level: At which level calculate upgrade duration

getBasicUpgradeCooldownDuration(uint256).details: If level=1 then returned value will be duration which is taken for upgrading from 1 to 2 level

params.level: At which level calculate upgrade duration

getBuildingCoefficient(uint256).details: Used to determine max treasury amount and new production coefficients

getBuildingLevel().details: Takes into an account if upgrades are finished or not

getConfig().details: Main config that determines which resources is produced/spend by production of this buildingInitialResourceBlock.perTick is value how much of resource is spend/produced by 1 worker in 1 second of production

getMaxHealthOnLevel(uint256).details: Useful to determine maximum amount of health will be available at provided level

params.level: Level at which calculate maximum amount of health

returns._0: Maximum amount of health for provided level

getMaxTreasuryByLevel(uint256).details: Can be used to determine maximum amount of treasury by any level

getMaxWorkers().details: Useful to determinate maximum amount of workers

getProducingResourceName().details: Return value is value from #getConfig where 'isProduced'=true

getProductionResult(uint256).details: Useful for determination how much of all production will be burned/produced at the specific time

params.timestamp: Time at which calculate amount of resources in building. If timestamp=0 -> calculates as block.timestamp

returns.res: Production resources changes at provided time

getResourcesAmount(string,uint256).details: Useful for determination how much of production resource (either producing and spending) at the specific time

params.resourceName: Name of resource related to production
params.timestamp: Time at which calculate amount of resources in building. If timestamp=0 -> calculates as block.timestamp

returns._0: Real amount of provided resource in building related to its production at provided time

getTreasury(uint256).details: Useful for determination how much treasury will be at specific time

params.timestamp: Time at which calculate amount of treasury in building. If timestamp=0 -> calculates as block.timestamp

getUpgradePrice(uint256).details: Useful for determination how much upgrade will cost at any level

returns._0: Amount of resources needed for upgrade
Amount of workers currently sitting in this building

increaseAdditionalWorkersCapacityMultipl.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

init(address).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

productionResourcesChanged().details: Even though function is opened, it is auto-called by transfer method. Standalone calls provide 0 impact.

removeResourcesAndWorkers(address,uint25.details: Removes resources+workers from building in single transaction

resetDistribution().details: Creates new distribution Nft and mints it to current settlement owner

startAdvancedUpgrade(address).details: Resources required for upgrade will be taken either from msg.sender or resourcesOwner (if resource.allowance allows it)If resourcesOwner == address(0) -> resources will be taken from msg.senderIf resourcesOwner != address(0) and resourcesOwner has given allowance to msg.sender >= upgradePrice -> resources will be taken from resourcesOwner

startBasicUpgrade(address).details: Resources required for upgrade will be taken either from msg.sender or resourcesOwner (if resource.allowance allows it)If resourcesOwner == address(0) -> resources will be taken from msg.senderIf resourcesOwner != address(0) and resourcesOwner has given allowance to msg.sender >= upgradePrice -> resources will be taken from resourcesOwner

stealTreasury(address,uint256).details: Called by siege or building owner, in either case part of resources will be burned according to #registry.getRobberyFee

params.amount: Amount of resources to steal, 'to' will get only part of specified 'amount', some percent of specified 'amount' will be burned
params.to: An address which will get resources

returns._0: Real amount of resources from which stealing occurred (min(amount, treasury))

updateHealth(uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

updateState().details: Updates building production minting treasury and increasing #production.readyToBeDistributed

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

DistributedToShareHolder(string,address,.notice: Emitted when #distribute is called. When resources from production are distributed to building token holders. Will be deprecated in favor of ERC20 transfer event.

distributeToAllShareholders().notice: Distributes produces resource to all shareholders

getMaxAvailableForAdvancedProductionWork.notice: Calculates max available for advanced production workers

getMaxTreasuryByLevel(uint256).notice: Calculates maximum amount of treasury by provided level

getProducingResourceName().notice: Calculates producing resource name for this building

getProductionResult(uint256).notice: Calculates production resources changes at provided time

getResourcesAmount(string,uint256).notice: Calculates real amount of provided resource in building related to its production at provided time
